title: Shiitake broth

default: 300ml/½ pint chicken stock (vegetarians may substitute with vegetable stock)

steps: Bring the chicken or vegetable stock to the boil and turn down to a gentle simmer.
Add the chilli, lemongrass, shiitake mushrooms, soy sauce and sesame oil. Simmer for five minutes, or until the mushrooms are tender.
Serve in a bowl topped with the coriander.
